mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le imprese heroiche et morali / ritrouate da m. Gabriello Symeoni Fiorentino, al Gran Conestabile di Francia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Rouillé, Guillaume, 1518?-1589
Simeoni, Gabriele, 1509-1575
Thibaron-Joly (Firm)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: According to Brunet, the two works are ordinarily found together.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Second title in volume with: Dialogo dell' imprese militari et amorose di Monsignor Giovio. --In Lione, 1559. Binder: Thibaron-Joly. Unidentified armorial binding, crest, with motto, Victor et fidelis. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 395.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Emblems--Italy--Early works to 1800.
